Question:
あの後のスーパーでも同じやり取り。
気まずくてしばらくあの商店街に行けないぞ。
……まぁネコの可愛いところと言われればそうなんだけども。
[バニラ]: 「ん？　くんくん、くんくん……」
[バニラ]: 「あっちからすごくいい匂いがする」
[ショコラ]: 「ほんとだ、すごく香ばしくていい匂いがしますご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「確かに。この匂いは……」
匂いのする方角へと顔を向ける。
[屋台のネコ]: 「いらっしゃいませー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「おいしいできたてのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「あっつあつで、かつおぶしたっぷりのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[ショコラ]: 「わぁ、ネコのたこ焼き屋さんだ！　珍しいですね、ご主人さま！」
reference_answer:
After that, it was the same sort of exchange at the supermarket.
The whole thing was so awkward that I don't think I can visit that shopping district for a while.
... Well, I guess you could say that was the cute side of catgirls.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmm? Sniff sniff, sniff sniff...」
[Vanilla]: 「Something smells really nice over there.」
[Chocola]: 「You're right! Something smells really good, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「It definitely does. What is this smell...」
I turned towards the source of it.
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Welcome~!」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some delicious, fresh takoyaki~?」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some piping hot takoyaki with lots of bonito flakes on top~?」
[Chocola]: 「Wah, it's a takoyaki shop run by a catgirl! That's pretty rare, huh, Master?!」
ModelAnswer:
After that, the same exchange happened at the supermarket too.
I couldn't go to that shopping district for a while because it was awkward.
…Well, if you say it's cute about cats, I suppose so.
Vanilla: "Hm? Kun-kun, kun-kun..."
Vanilla: "There's a really nice smell coming from over there"
Chocola: "Indeed, it smells very delicious, sir!"
Minaduki Kashou: "Sure enough. This smell is..."
He turns his face towards the direction of the scent.
Street Cat Vendor: "Welcome! "
Street Cat Vendor: "How about these freshly made takoyaki?"
Street Cat Vendor: "Hot and full of katsuobushi, how about these takoyaki?"
Chocola: "Wow, a cat takoyaki shop! It's rare, sir!"

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「いい子になれるようにって！」
[バニラ]: 「時雨、厳しい。でもお陰様で色々と覚えた」
[店主]: 「そうなんだ？　良いご主人様なのね」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、でもご主人さまはご主人さまなんです！」
[ショコラ]: 「時雨ちゃんは時雨ちゃんですから！　ね、ご主人さま？」
[バニラ]: 「通訳すると、時雨は大事な友達」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人って呼ぶのはこっちのご主人だけってことで」
[店主]: 「あはは。愛されてるんだね、ご主人さまは？」
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、ありがたいことに」
肘で軽く小突かれる。
照れくさいような苦笑いで返事を返す。
……外だと流石にちょっと照れくさい。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「She said we'd grow up to be good catgirls if we listened to her!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure was tough on us. But thanks to her, we learned a lot.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Really? What a wonderful owner you have.」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, but Master is Master!」
[Chocola]: 「And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?」
[Vanilla]: 「In other words, Shigure is an important friend.」
[Vanilla]: 「And when we say 'Master,' we are referring to Master over here.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Ahaha! You're a very well-loved "master," aren't you?」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I am grateful.」
She lightly nudged me with her elbow.
I responded with an embarrassed, forced smile.
... Hearing this kind of stuff in public sure was embarrassing.
ModelAnswer:
Chocola: "To become a good girl!"
Vanilla: "Shigure, you're strict. But thanks to you, I've learned a lot."
Owner: "So you are? A good Master then?"
Chocola: "But Master is Master!"
Chocola: "Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan too! Right, Master?"
Vanilla: "Translation-wise, Shigure is an important friend."
Vanilla: "You call the Master here your Master only."
Owner: "Haha. It's nice to be loved, isn't it, Master?"
Kashou: "Well, fortunate as always."
Elbow lightly nudged.
Returns a slightly embarrassed and self-deprecating smile.
...It's a bit too embarrassing to admit that outside.

Question:
無慈悲な電子音が響く携帯電話を見つめる。
……時雨と連絡さえ付けば、すぐに解決すると思ってたのに。
[ショコラ]: 「はむ、んぐんぐんぐ、朝ごはんおいしーですね！」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまのごはんはいつでもおいしーですにゃー♪」

当の本人たちはサンドウィッチを満足そうに頬張っている。
ちなみに中身はトマトとチーズとレタス。
それに半熟の目玉焼きを挟み込んだシンプルなもの。
朝食だったらまぁこんなもんだろ。
[嘉祥]: 「お前ら、今日こそは家に帰るんだからな？」
reference_answer:
As the ruthless electronic buzz of the dropped call echoed, I stared at my cell phone.
... And here I thought that I could sort all this out if I could just talk to Shigure.
[Chocola]: 「Munch munch munch, breakfast tastes good!」
[Chocola]: 「Master's breakfast always tastes good, meow~ ♪」
[Vanilla]: 「Chocola, there's some ketchup on your cheek.」
[Vanilla]: 「It's cutely artistic. I'll lick it off. Shlurp slurp~」
The catgirls in question were happily stuffing themselves with sandwiches.
These sandwiches incidentally contained tomato, cheese, and lettuce.
With an over-easy fried egg tucked inside all of that, it was a simple meal.
Breakfast was pretty much like this.
[Kashou]: 「You two are definitely going home today, okay?」
ModelAnswer:
A merciless electronic beep is heard as Shigure stares at her phone.
……I thought everything would be resolved just by getting in touch with you, Shigure.
[Chocola]: "Hmu, ngungungung, breakfast is so yummy!"
[Chocola]: "Master's breakfast is always so yummy~♪"
[Vanilla]: "Choco, there's ketchup on your cheek."
[Vanilla]: "It's cute artistically. I'll lick it off for you." licking sound
The actual owners are happily munching on their sandwiches.
By the way, the filling inside is tomato, cheese, and lettuce.
With a half-cooked egg sandwich in between, it’s simple but fitting for breakfast.

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
ハキハキとした笑顔で伝票とペンを差し出される。
[嘉祥]: 「そうですね、えっと……」
受け取った伝票を改めて確認する。
[嘉祥]: 「……どうも、自分が頼んだものと違うみたいなんですけども」
[食器業者]: 「……え、本当ですか？」
[食器業者]: 「それは、品物が違う……ということでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いえ、頼んだものも確かに入ってるみたいなのですが……」
店内に積まれたダンボールへと視線を向ける。
小さな店内に積まれたダンボールの山、山、山。
むしろ店内がほぼダンボールになっていた。
[嘉祥]: 「見ての通り、ウチではこんなにたくさんの食器は必要ないので……」
[食器業者]: 「す、すみません！　すぐに本社に確認しますので！」
[食器業者]: 「少々お待ち頂いてもよろしいでしょうか！？」
reference_answer:
She smiled brightly and brought out the invoice along with a pen.
[Kashou]: 「Okay, let's see...」
I looked over the sales invoice I received once more.
[Kashou]: 「... Somehow, this doesn't look like what I ordered.」
[Tableware Seller]: 「... Huh, is that so?」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Are you saying that these... aren't the correct items?」
[Kashou]: 「No, the stuff I ordered is in here too, but...」
I looked over at the pile of boxes inside the bakery.
Inside of my tiny bakery was a mountain of boxes. A MOUNTAIN.
It was as if the inside of the bakery had become completely made of boxes.
[Kashou]: 「As you can see, we don't need this much tableware inside the bakery...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I-I'm sorry! I'll check with the main office right away!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Could you give me a few moments?」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "So it seems, um..."
After taking the receipt, he confirms it again.
Minaduki Kashou: "...It seems that what I ordered is different."
[食器業者]: "...R-really?"
[食器業者]: "Does that mean the items are different?"
Minaduki Kashou: "No, it looks like the items I ordered are there too..."
He shifts his gaze to the cardboard boxes piled up in the store.
A mountain of cardboard boxes, a mountain, a mountain. The store was almost entirely made of cardboard.
Minaduki Kashou: "As you can see, we don't need so many dishes here..."
[食器業者]: "S-sorry! I'll confirm with headquarters right away!"
[食器業者]: "Would it be alright if you wait for a moment?!"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[食器業者]: 「こちらのミスで、別の注文書と混じってしまっていたようでして……」
[食器業者]: 「水無月様の方もすぐにご入用と思いますので……」
[食器業者]: 「もしよろしければ、ご注文分の食器を受け取って頂ければと思うのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「注文分を受け取れって……」
[嘉祥]: 「……え？　この中からですか？」
そびえ立つダンボールの山。
思わず言葉に詰まる。
どれも一様に同じ箱なわけで。
中身を開けてみるまで何が入っているのか分からない。
しかも伝票を見ればどれも最高級のティーセットや食器。
なので、扱いにも細心の注意を払わないととんでもないことになる。
[嘉祥]: 「あの、確かに開店準備もあるので今日もらえたら嬉しいですけども……」
[嘉祥]: 「……今からこれを全部って、相当時間かかりますよね？」
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「Because of an error on our part, it appears that another order got mixed in with yours...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I imagine that you may be in need of these items right away, Mr. Minaduki...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「So if at all possible, if you would be able to accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「Accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「... Huh? From all this?」
The mountain of cardboard boxes towered over everything.
I was at a loss for words.
Every box was of equal size.
I wouldn't know what was inside each of them without opening them up.
On top of that, looking at the sales invoice, I could see that they all contained expensive tea sets and tableware.
And if I accepted it all, it would be a lot of work to deal with all the new items.
[Kashou]: 「Uhm, there's still things that need doing in advance of my bakery's opening, so I don't mind accepting these...」
[Kashou]: 「... but it's going to take a while to deal with all of this.」
ModelAnswer:
[Supplier]: "It seems that it got mixed up with another order slip by mistake…"
[Supplier]: "I assume you will need the items soon, Minaduki-sama…"
[Supplier]: "If it's alright with you, could I have you take receipt of your ordered dishes?"
[Minaduki]: "Take receipt of the ordered dishes…"
[Minaduki]: "...What? From among these?"
A towering mountain of cardboard boxes.
The words get stuck in my throat.
They're all uniform boxes.
You can't tell what's inside until you open them up.
And from the invoices, they are all top-tier tea sets and tableware.
So, without being careful with handling, it could lead to a disaster.
[Minaduki]: "Um, indeed I have opening day preparations so if I could get them today that would be great…"
[Minaduki]: "...But wouldn't it take quite some time to go through all of this right now?"

昨日と同じ夕方の公園通り。
でも今日は屋台は見当たらない。
ネコたちを実家に送ろうにも今日に限って誰もおらず。
俺も実家の鍵は置いて来てしまっていた。
だから時雨が帰宅するまで時間調整で買い物へ。

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「... It must be pretty nice to live the simple life of a catgirl, huh?」
I pondered as I looked at the name of the bakery affixed to the window.
With a bitter smile, I began to clean up the tea sets that had arrived earlier.
[Vanilla]: 「Huh, that takoyaki seller isn't here today.」
Just like yesterday, we took a walk through the park in the evening.
However, that food stand was nowhere to be found.
It just so happened that no one was home on the day I decided to take the two catgirls home.
I had also happened to leave the house key behind.
So to make good use of time, I went to do some shopping before Shigure got home.
[Chocola]: 「... Eh? Ah, s-sorry, Vanilla!」
[Chocola]: 「What was it called... catnip?」
[Vanilla]: 「That sounds about right.」
ModelAnswer:
Master: "…If I could live as simply as a cat, it would be much easier in many ways."
Looking at the shop name贴ed on the window.
Shaking off a bitter smile, he started putting away the just-delivered tea set.
Vanilla: "Hey, today that takoyaki stand isn't here."
It's the same afternoon street in the park as yesterday.
But today there are no food stalls to be seen.
Since no one was around to send the cats back home today either, and I left the key to my family home behind,
I went shopping for some time adjustment while Shigure returns home.
Chocola: "…Huh? Oh, s-sorry Vanilla!"
Chocola: "What was it again, something like matatabi?"
Vanilla: "Pretty much."

[嘉祥]: 「……別に謝ることじゃないだろ」
困ったような笑顔で頭を下げる。
元気がない理由なんか分かり切ってるから。
だから何も言わずにいるしかない。

reference_answer:

[Chocola]: 「... Ah, no, Chocola is fine. Sorry to worry you, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「... There's no need for you to apologize.」
She had a troubled smile on her face as she nodded.
It was pretty clear why she wasn't in good spirits.
That's why there was nothing I could really say to her.
[Kashou]: 「Well, there happens to be a bench over there, so why don't we rest a bit?」
[Vanilla]: 「In that case, I will go buy something to drink.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, thanks. Something for everyone, okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Understood. Leave it to me.」
I handed Vanilla some change and offered the bench to Chocola.
The constant sea breeze rustled the trees in the park.

Chocola: "But it's fine. I'm sorry to worry you, Master."

He lowers his head with a worried smile.
I know there's no need to explain why she doesn't seem energetic.
So there's nothing more he can say.

Deciding not to pursue it further, Shigure gives a small smile and tilts her head in response.
She would have said it directly if she wanted to be straightforward.
That's just one of Shigure's old-fashioned quirks.
Minaduki Shigure: "I understand what Master says,"
Minaduki Shigure: "but cats are smart enough to become family members for humans or partners too."
Minaduki Shigure: "…which is why"
She takes a breath there.
Then, she wears a troubled smile and looks at me.
Minaduki Shigure: "…I think it must be lonely if no one relies on you."

reference_answer:
The first thing I saw this morning was so unexpected, my brain couldn't process it all.
[Shigure]: 「Good morning, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「This recent incident has gotten me thinking...」
She wore a sunny smile that no cloud could cover up.
The catgirls looked at me with similar smiles.
I felt myself break out in a cold sweat...
[Kashou]: 「Haah... thinking... about what...?」
I only managed to get out that much.
[Shigure]: 「After that incident, I learned that there's no way to keep Nii-sama from attempting to achieve the impossible.」
[Shigure]: 「However, it's also a fact that his dear little sister -- namely me -- is losing sleep from worrying about him so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Then, I thought that maybe having more workers would lessen Nii-sama's burden. That was the best plan.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Huh.」
ModelAnswer:
Morning from the start, I can't keep up with this unexpected sight.
Shigure: "Good morning, Master"
Shigure: "I've been thinking a lot about this incident"
A bright and clear smile.
All the other cats are smiling at me in the same way.
Cold sweat trickles down as I manage to say,
Kashou: "Haa... Thinking about what...?"
I barely get that out.
Shigure: "Now that I've seen this, I understand why it's unreasonable to make Master do too much"
Shigure: "But it's also a fact that I was kept up at night worrying as your sister..."
Shigure: "So, Shigure thought that increasing the staff would be the best way to reduce Master's burden"
Kashou: "Haa..."

reference_answer:
That's all I say before leaving the Minaduki house. Almost as if I'm running away.
I have so many things running through my mind that my thoughts are a jumbled mess.
Before I realize it, I'm standing in the park in the middle of the night.
[Kashou]: 「Aah...」
I left my house keys, wallet, and everything else in my bag back at the house.

[Vanilla]: 「You forgot this, Master.」
Vanilla is holding my bag.
[Kashou]: 「You fetched that for me, Vanilla?」
[Vanilla]: 「Naturally. We can't camp outside.」
[Kashou]: 「Good point.」
Without the key to the house, not only would I be locked out, but so would these two.

Before I knew it, I was in the night park.
[Minaduki]: "Ah..."
I had put everything—keys and wallet—into my bag and left them behind.
[Minaduki]: "What am I doing..."

Vanilla's hand held my bag.
[Minaduki]: "You brought it back, Vanilla."

[Minaduki]: "That's true."
If there were no keys, neither me nor the two of them would have been able to get into the house.

Vanilla: "There's a vending machine over there. I'll get warm drinks to bring back. It's going to be cold tonight."
Minaduki Kashou: "…Got it"
Though he said reward, Vanilla is likely getting warm drinks for me.
I didn't realize how cold my body had become.
Vanilla: "Here, Master"
Minaduki Kashou: "Thanks, Vanilla"
I took the can of coffee she brought back.

大袈裟な――と思ったが、俺は時雨の応援に甘えることにした。
チェックインを済ませ、部屋へ。

While I think she's exaggerating like crazy, I decide to take Shigure up on her support.
We finish checking in and head to our rooms.

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
仕入れ先に頼みたいことがあった。急ぎではないが、早いうちに電話しておいたほうがいい。
個人経営のパティスリーなら普通のことだと思うが、俺は仕入れ先の一つ一つと自分で交渉をしている。
一般流通されていないような食材も、まとまった量を仕入れるなら、売ってくれる農家もある。
味の探究は、食材を探す旅でもあった。
皆が観光で盛り上がっているときに、仕事の話をするのも野暮なので、俺は私用があると言って、部屋を離れる。
念のために旅館からも出て、静かな場所で話すことにした。
電話をかける。
[嘉祥]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……」
国外からの注文ということで先方に驚かれたが、どうにか発送してくれそうだ。
俺は旅館の中へと戻る。
reference_answer:
There's something I wanna request from a supplier. It's no rush, but it's a good idea to give him a phone call as soon as possible.
I think it's pretty common for an independently-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with every single supplier on my own.
Even for ingredients not in circulation for the general public, if I need to replenish my supply of them in bulk, there are farmers who will buy it for me.
Researching flavors is also a journey to search for ingredients.
Since it'd be uncouth of me to talk about work when everyone is excited about sightseeing, I tell them that I have personal business to take care of and leave the room.
Just to be sure, I leave the inn and decide to talk someplace quieter.
I make my phone call.
[Kashou]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[Kashou]: 「Phew...」
I was met with surprise from the other person on the line since it was an order from overseas, but it seems they'll be putting in my order.
I return to the inn.
ModelAnswer:
SPEAKER_NAME: "Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?"
[Minaduki]: "ふぅ……"
Due to an order from abroad, the other party was surprised but seems likely to ship it.
I return to the inn.

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「どれ、１つ食べてみるか」
屋台で温泉まんじゅうを１つ買った。
できたて熱々だ。
かじってみると、ふっくらしていて、思っていたよりしっとりした食感だった。
舌のうえで、ほろほろと餡子が崩れて、甘味が広がる。
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど……ほふほふ……これは、美味しいな」
俺が作る洋菓子も、実家の和菓子も、温かいものを出すということはない。
熱々のまんじゅうを、ほふほふ言いながら食べるのは、これはこれで面白い体験だった。
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、温泉街には何度か来ているけれど……食べたことなかったな」
昔はネコたちがいなかったからだ。
両親と時雨と俺の４人で旅行しても、買い食いしようなんて話にはならなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well then, maybe I should have one.」
I buy a hot-spring manju bun from the stand.
It's freshly made and piping hot.
I take a bite into it, and my mouth is greeted by a fluffy and moist sensation.
Atop my tongue, the red bean paste starts to break down, and the sweetness starts to spread.
[Kashou]: 「Now I see... Fff, Fff... This is pretty good.」
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the Japanese sweets my family makes are ever served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju bun while huffing to cool it down in my mouth is a pretty interesting experience in its own right.
[Kashou]: 「You know, I've been to the hot spring district plenty of times in the past, but... I never ate one of these before.」
Mostly because the catgirls weren't around back then.
Even when the four of us—my parents, Shigure, and I—traveled, buying local snacks and eating never came into the equation.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Which one, I'll try one"
Bought a hot fresh onsen manju from the stall.
It's still steaming hot.
Chewing it, it's fluffy and has a silkier texture than expected.
In my mouth, the red bean paste crumbles slightly, spreading its sweetness.
Minaduki Kashou: "I see... huff huff... this is delicious"
Neither the Western pastries I make nor the traditional sweets from my family home are warm treats.
Eating a steaming hot manju and saying 'huff huff' while doing so was an interesting experience in its own right.
Minaduki Kashou: "By the way, I've been to the onsen town a few times... but never actually tried one"
It's because there were no cats back then.
Even when traveling with my parents and Shigure, we never talked about buying snacks.

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「やあ、ここに居たのか、時雨。もしかして用事？」
[時雨]: 「いいえ、もう大丈夫です」
[嘉祥]: 「もしかして、時雨も仕事の電話だったのかな？」
[時雨]: 「……は、はい。すみません。せっかくの旅行中に」
[嘉祥]: 「謝るようなことじゃないよ。ソレイユは定休日だけど、世間は平日なんだし」
詳しくは聞いていないが、時雨は会社を経営しているらしい。
その収入で、ネコたちの衣服を買ったり、鈴持ちの受験をさせたり。
父親は俺に対しては厳しいが、妹の時雨には甘い。ネコのことも商売のことも、自由にさせているようだった。
[嘉祥]: 「ネコたちは、思い思いに満喫してたよ。卓球とか、ゲームとか……売店とか」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Heya, so this is where you've been, Shigure? Did you need something?」
[Shigure]: 「No, I'm fine now.」
[Kashou]: 「Did you have to put in a call for work, too, by any chance?」
[Shigure]: 「...Y-Yes. I apologize for doing it in the middle of our vacation.」
[Kashou]: 「Nothing to apologize over. La Soleil may be on a regular holiday, but it is a weekday by normal standards.」
She never told me the specifics, but Shigure apparently runs a company.
With her income, she's able to buy the catgirls' clothes and allow them to take bell-holder exams, among other things.
My dad is harsh toward me, but he's soft toward my younger sister, Shigure. It seems that he is pretty liberal toward the catgirls and his business.
[Kashou]: 「The catgirls are enjoying themselves individually. Playing ping-pong, playing video games... buying from the concession stand.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Hey, you were here, Shigure. Maybe for business?"
Shigure: "No, I'm fine now."
Kashou: "Maybe you were also on a work call like me?"
Shigure: "...Y-yes. Sorry. During our trip..."
Kashou: "There's no need to apologize. La Soleil is closed but it's a weekday for the rest of the world."
I haven't asked in detail, but Shigure seems to run a company.
With that income, she buys clothes for the cats and makes them take the Bell exam.
While he's strict with me, he's kind to his sister Shigure. It seems he lets her do what she wants with both the cats and her business.
Kashou: "The cats were enjoying themselves doing their own thing—table tennis, games... even the snack shop."

[嘉祥]: 「……すごい」

[嘉祥]: 「めちゃくちゃ上手いじゃないか！」

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am glad to hear that... Nii-sama, how about we both enjoy ourselves—just us, as brother and sister?」
[Kashou]: 「Sure, but what did you have in mind?」
[Shigure]: 「I've heard they have a karaoke room here.」
[Kashou]: 「Karaoke, eh? I only went a bit back in high school. Can you sing, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「I dabbled in chorus when I was a child.」
Sounds like a plan, then.
[Shigure]: 「Now then, this will be dedicated to you, Nii-sama...」
Once she starts singing, the mood gets turned on its head.
[Shigure]: 「~~~♪」
[Kashou]: 「...Amazing.」
[Shigure]: 「Hah~ It has been quite some time since I've exerted my voice like that.」
[Kashou]: 「You're REALLY good!」
To be frank, she's practically pro level. I give her generous applause.
ModelAnswer:
Sugure: "That's good. …Master, how about we play together without being brother and sister for a change?"  
Kashou: "Sure, but what do we do?"  
Sugure: "They say there's a karaoke room."  
Kashou: "Karaoke... I went once or twice in high school. Can you sing, Sugure?"  
Sugure: "I participated in choir during my early years, so maybe a little."  
Things turned out that way.
Sugure: "Then, with all my feelings for Master..."  
As she started singing, the atmosphere changed dramatically.
Sugure: "～～～♪"  
Kashou: "…Impressive."  
Sugure: "Haha~ I haven't sung loudly like this in a while."  
Kashou: "You're freaking amazing!"  
To be honest, it was professional-level. I couldn't stop clapping enthusiastically.

Question:
[アズキ]: 「すー……すー……ふへへ……」

[時雨]: 「すー……すー……」
やはり、眠れそうにない。
俺は音を立てないように気をつけつつ、部屋を出た。
宿は常夜灯があるが、そこを離れると田舎の夜だ。
場所によっては、自分の足元さえわからないほどの暗闇が広がっている。
昼間は観光客で賑わっている温泉街も、深夜となると、すっかり雰囲気が違っている。
橋から下を眺める。
暗闇だ。
川の流れる水音だけがしていた。
川面に映った月が見えそう……いや、あれは街灯の光か？
確かめようと、俺は橋の下を覗きこんだ。
reference_answer:
[Azuki]: 「Zz... Zz... Heh heh...」
[Coconut]: 「Mm-nya mm-gh... Onee-hyaan... That's my manju... Mm-nya.」
[Shigure]: 「Zzz... Zzz...」
Yeah, I don't think I can get to sleep.
I exit the room, careful not to make a sound on the way out.
The inn has its lamps on at night, but once I leave the area, I'm greeted by rural darkness.
Depending on the spot, it's dark enough that I can't even tell where it is I'm standing.
This hot spring district is usually bustling with tourists during the day, but in the wee hours of the night, it has a completely different atmosphere.
I peer down from the bridge.
Darkness.
All I can hear is the sound of the running river.
I feel I can make out the moon's reflection on the water's surface... No, wait, is that just a street light?
I peer deeper below the bridge to confirm.
ModelAnswer:
[Azuki]: "suu… suu… fuhehe…"
[Coconut]: "nyan chama… onee hyaan… sore, boku no manju… mnya"
[Shigure]: "suu… suu…"
Still, it seems she won't be sleeping anytime soon.
I carefully made my way out of the room without making a sound.
The inn has night lamps, but once you leave them, it's the countryside at night.
In some places, the darkness is so thick that you can't even see your own feet.
Even though the hot spring town was bustling with tourists during the day, at midnight, the atmosphere had completely changed.
I looked down from the bridge.
It was dark.
All I could hear was the sound of water flowing in the river.
The moon seemed to be reflected on the surface of the river… no, is that actually streetlight glow?  
I peered under the bridge to confirm.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Azuki (アズキ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[アズキ]: 「外靴がなかったからな。普通じゃねーだろ、こんな夜中に？」
[嘉祥]: 「申し訳ない……本当に気分転換だったんだよ」
[アズキ]: 「悩みって、まだコンビニスイーツのことで？」
[嘉祥]: 「いやいや、さすがに、それはもう大丈夫だ」
[嘉祥]: 「ただ、今までのことを思い出して……自分には何が足りないのだろう、と考えてみたりさ」
[アズキ]: 「嘉祥の今までのことって？」
[嘉祥]: 「……大学卒業後に、俺はフランス留学をした」
[嘉祥]: 「卒業して、何の選択肢もなく家業を継ぐのが、どうにも釈然としなくて。自分の見識を広げたかったんだ」
[嘉祥]: 「勘違いしないでほしいんだけど……水無月の和菓子が嫌いなわけじゃないからな？」
reference_answer:
[Azuki]: 「Because you didn't put on outside shoes. That's not normal for a walk this late at night, don't you think?」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry... I really just needed to clear my head.」
[Azuki]: 「Are the convenience store sweets still what's buggin' you?」
[Kashou]: 「No, no. I'm good on that front now.」
[Kashou]: 「It's just that I've been thinking back on everything up till now... and I'm almost positive that there's something I'm still lacking.」
[Azuki]: 「What's 'everything up till now' for you, exactly?」
[Kashou]: 「...After I graduated college, I studied abroad in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Graduating and taking over the family business with no other options on the table wasn't satisfactory to me in the least. I wanted to broaden my horizons.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't want you to get the wrong impression, though... It's not like I hate the Minaduki's Japanese-style sweets, got it?」
ModelAnswer:
Azuki: "There were no outdoor shoes. It's not usual, is it, to be out at this hour?"
Kashou: "I apologize… I really just needed a change of scenery."
Azuki: "Are you still worrying about the convenience store sweets?"
Kashou: "No no, that's all taken care of now."
Kashou: "Just thinking about what was missing from my past…"
Azuki: "What specifically about Kashou's past?"
Kashou: "…After graduating university, I went to France for a study abroad program."
Kashou: "I didn't feel right just taking over the family business with no other options. I wanted to broaden my horizons."
Kashou: "Please don't misunderstand… It's not that I dislike Minaduki's wagashi?"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Azuki (アズキ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「……パリの街角で、俺は師匠のケーキに出会った」
[嘉祥]: 「師匠の店で、感動するほど美味しい洋菓子を食べて、その店に来る人たちの笑顔を見たんだ」
[嘉祥]: 「これこそが、俺の求めているものだ――と思った」
[アズキ]: 「水無月の和菓子屋にはないものか？」
[嘉祥]: 「水無月は客席がないからな。作った和菓子の大半は、デパートで売られているし」
[アズキ]: 「ああ、そういやな」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は師匠に頼みこんで弟子入りして……洋菓子作りを教えてもらった」
[嘉祥]: 「留学が終わりに近付いた頃――師匠からもう全て教えたと言われた」
[嘉祥]: 「俺としては、ぜんぜん師匠の味に追いつけてないと感じていたが……」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「...On a Paris street corner is where I first encountered my mentor's cakes.」
[Kashou]: 「In my mentor's shop, I ate those impressively delicious Western-style sweets and saw the smiles of the patrons there.」
[Kashou]: 「I thought to myself that this was exactly what I was in search of.」
[Azuki]: 「Something that wasn't in the Minaduki Japanese sweet shop?」
[Kashou]: 「The Minaduki shop doesn't have seating for patrons. The majority of the Japanese sweets they make are sold in department stores, after all.」
[Azuki]: 「Aah, true, now that you mention it.」
[Kashou]: 「I pleaded with my mentor to take me as their apprentice... and learned the ways of Western confectioneries from them.」
[Kashou]: 「When my study abroad was nearing an end... my mentor told me, 'I've already taught you everything.'」
[Kashou]: 「Although, personally, I don't feel as though I've matched my mentor's distinct flavor in the slightest...」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "…In the streets of Paris, I met my master's cake."
Minaduki Kashou: "At his shop, I ate Western confections so delicious that they moved me to tears, and saw the smiles of those who came to the store."
Minaduki Kashou: "This is what I was seeking—"
Azuki: "Is there something the waterless moon's wagashi shop doesn't have?"
Minaduki Kashou: "Waterless Moon doesn't have a customer area. Most of the wagashi I make are sold in department stores."
Azuki: "Ah, right."
Minaduki Kashou: "I begged my master to let me become his disciple and… was taught how to make Western pastries."
Minaduki Kashou: "Near the end of my studies—my master said he had taught me everything."
Minaduki Kashou: "Even so, I felt I could never catch up to my master's taste."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Azuki (アズキ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[アズキ]: 「そもそも、なんで太陽なんだ？」
[嘉祥]: 「それは由来があるらしいんだが……はぐらかされてしまったよ」
[嘉祥]: 「プライベートな理由らしい。今は独り暮らしだが、夫と息子がいたらしくて……それが関係しているんじゃないか、と思う」
[アズキ]: 「ふむふむ……まぁ、言いたくねーことだったら、無理に聞いてもな」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、そう思う」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は……師匠から多くのことを教わった。本当に、いろいろなことを……」
[嘉祥]: 「洋菓子については、自負があったんだ。自信があった」
[嘉祥]: 「ところが、いつもは洋菓子のことを話しもしない親父が、ぽんと作った生クリームに、負けた」
[アズキ]: 「そんなに差があったのか？」
reference_answer:
[Azuki]: 「Why pick the sun in the first place?」
[Kashou]: 「There's apparently an origin behind the name, but... she never gave me a clear answer to it.」
[Kashou]: 「Seems like something she wants to keep private. She lives by herself now, but she once had a husband and a son... so I assume it has something to do with that.」
[Azuki]: 「Mm-hmm, mm-hmm... Well, if it's somethin' she doesn't wanna talk about, no use forcin' the topic, eh?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, that's my logic.」
[Kashou]: 「I was... taught many things by way of my mentor. Really, all sorts of things...」
[Kashou]: 「When it came to Western sweets, I had pride—I had confidence.」
[Kashou]: 「And yet, I was shown up by the whipped cream my father threw together despite him never so much as mentioning Western sweets before.」
[Azuki]: 「Was there that big of a difference?」
ModelAnswer:
Azuki: "So, why is it the sun?"
Kashou: "It seems there's a reason behind it… but I was dodged."
Kashou: "Seems to be a private reason. Currently living alone, but if he had a husband and son… maybe that has something to do with it."
Azuki: "Hmm hmm… Well, if they don't want to say, there's no point in forcing them to."
Kashou: "Yeah, I think so."
Kashou: "I learned a lot from my master. Truly, many things…"
Kashou: "About Western pastries, I was proud of myself. Confident."
Kashou: "But then, my father who never talked about pastries before lost to a cream he just made on the spot."
Azuki: "Was it that much of a difference?"

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「...Neighborhood association Christmas event, huh?」
[Coconut]: 「Ah, yeah. Seems like they're having live performances, a talk show, and stuff like that in the town square.」
[Coconut]: 「Sounds like a blast!」
[Kashou]: 「Runs from afternoon to evening, huh? It's unfortunate, but we won't be able to make it.」
[Coconut]: 「Really?」
[Kashou]: 「This is the first Christmas since La Soleil opened, so you probably don't know, but...」
[Kashou]: 「Cake shops are a warzone during Christmas.」

[Kashou]: 「Christmas is the day where cakes sell the most in Japan.」

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「ウチは初めてだから、どのくらいお客さんが来るかわからないけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「店によっては、１年の半分をクリスマス１日で売り上げるなんて話も聞いたことがある」
[嘉祥]: 「それだけ忙しいってことだ」
[ココナツ]: 「ひええぇぇー……っ！」
[嘉祥]: 「多くの家でクリスマス・パーティーが開かれて、ケーキはテーブルの中央を飾るんだよ」
[ココナツ]: 「うんうん、クリスマス・パーティー、やったよね！」
[ココナツ]: 「楽しかったなぁ……」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、水無月の家でやったなぁ」
[ココナツ]: 「お兄ちゃんが作ってくれた料理、すっごい美味しかった！」
[嘉祥]: 「そいつはよかった」
[嘉祥]: 「今年は、そんな余裕はなさそうだけど……」
reference_answer:
[Coconut]: 「A-Are we?」
[Kashou]: 「This is our first time, so I don't know exactly how many customers we'll have coming, but...」
[Kashou]: 「I've even heard that, depending on the shop, you can end up selling out half of a year's worth of stock on Christmas alone.」
[Kashou]: 「That's how busy it gets.」
[Coconut]: 「Eeeeeek...!」
[Kashou]: 「A lot of houses will be throwing Christmas parties with a cake as the centerpiece to their tables.」
[Coconut]: 「Yeah, yeah! We had a Christmas party before!」
[Coconut]: 「It sure was fun...」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, back at the Minaduki house.」
[Coconut]: 「The food you made for it was so delicious!」
[Kashou]: 「Glad to hear it.」
[Kashou]: 「This year, I don't think we'll be able to indulge, though...」
ModelAnswer:
Coconut: "S-so it is?"
Minaduki Kashou: "I'm new at this, so I don't know how many customers we'll get... but..."
Minaduki Kashou: "I've heard that some stores make half their annual sales on just Christmas Day."
Minaduki Kashou: "That's how busy it can be."
Coconut: "Hieiieee...!"
Minaduki Kashou: "In many homes, Christmas parties are held and cakes decorate the center of the table."
Coconut: "Y-yeah, we had a Christmas party, didn't we!"
Coconut: "It was so fun..."
Minaduki Kashou: "Yeah, at your house."
Coconut: "The food brother made was super delicious!"
Minaduki Kashou: "That's good."
Minaduki Kashou: "This year doesn't look like it will have that kind of time..."

[Kashou]: 「Yeah... You two have done more than enough to help anyway.」

[Kashou]: 「Yeah, for a week... No, three days at best... Will you let me have that much time?」
[Maple]: 「Are you going to go isolate yourself in the mountains or something?」
[Cinnamon]: 「Ah, training~?! You're going to train~?! Coming up with revelations as you sit under a waterfall and all that~?!」
ModelAnswer:

Kaishou: "Yeah... You've all been working hard enough."
Kaishou: "In fact, it's because you're here that I can make a decision."

Maple: "Are you going to seclude yourself in the mountains or something?"

[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I'm sorry, but I don't want the shop to close up in the meantime. It was closed the entire time during that hot spring trip and all.」
If we keep temporarily closing up the shop, then it's bound to dissuade customers from coming.

Minaduki Kashou: "Sorry, but I don't want to close the shop for a break. We're already doing temporary closings during hot springs trips."
If you keep doing temporary closings, customers might stop coming.

Question:
って、そんなわけあるか！いくら俺でも、妹のことを見間違えたりはしない。
[嘉祥]: 「なにやってるんだ、時雨……？」
[時雨]: 「……見つかってしまいましたか。兄様」
[時雨]: 「現地の人たちに、完璧に溶けこんだつもりだったのですが」
[嘉祥]: 「いや……パリでも、そんな貴族みたいなドレス姿は、そうそう見かけないんだが……」
パリは石畳の道が多く、階段を使うことも多く、ハイヒールは転倒の危険がある。女性でもスニーカーや革靴を履く者が多い。
そして、スリムなジーンズをはいている女性は多く、スカート姿の女性は珍しい。
服の色は黒か白だ。ベージュや柄物のアウターを着ているのは、おおねむ観光客だった。
[時雨]: 「残念です……完璧だと思ったのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、まぁ……その格好も似合ってるから、いいんじゃないか？」
reference_answer:
Yeah, as if! Not even I would mistake someone else for my little sister.
[Kashou]: 「What are you doing here, Shigure...?」
[Shigure]: 「...So, you ended up finding me, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「I was trying to perfectly blend in with the local people.」
[Kashou]: 「Uh, well... Even in Paris, you don't really see people running around with such an aristocratic-looking dress.」
Paris is full of stone-paved roads and you're often climbing stairs, so wearing high-heels is risky. Even the majority of ladies wear sneakers or leather shoes.
Also, most girls wear slim jeans, so girls in skirts are rare.
Their clothes are usually black or white. Mostly anyone wearing beige or patterned outerwear is a tourist.
[Shigure]: 「How unfortunate... I thought it was perfect...」
[Kashou]: 「Uh, well... Your outfit looks nice on you, so it's fine, right?」
ModelAnswer:
SPEAKER_NAME: "What kind of reason is that! Even I wouldn't mistake my sister for someone else."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "What are you doing, Shigure...?"
[Minaduki Shigure]: "…It seems I was discovered. Master."
[Minaduki Shigure]: "I thought I had blended in perfectly with the locals,"
[Minaduki Kashou]: "No... In Paris, you don't usually see someone dressed like a noblewoman in such a dress..."
Paris has many cobblestone streets and uses stairs frequently, so high heels pose a risk of tripping. Many women wear sneakers or leather shoes.
And there are many women wearing slim jeans, while skirted women are rare.
The colors of the clothes are mostly black or white. Those wearing beige or patterned outerwear were likely sleepy tourists.

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[時雨]: 「兄様から何度か話だけは伺っていましたが……とうとう訪れることができました」
[時雨]: 「私にとっては、聖地。まさに、聖地巡礼の気分です」
[嘉祥]: 「……そういうものか？」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は留学先が近いこともあって、懐かしい気分だよ。帰ってきたって感じだ」
[時雨]: 「兄様の留学先、この近くなのですね」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、この通りを数分歩いた先だな」
[時雨]: 「だとすると、本家ラ・ソレイユのお客さんは、学生さんが多いのですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「うーん……学生のお客さんもいるけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「やっぱり、主婦が一番多いかな。子連れのお母さんも、よく来るよ」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「You've told me about this place so many times in the past, but... I can't believe I'm finally getting to visit.」
[Shigure]: 「This is sacred ground to me. This whole thing feels like a pilgrimage.」
[Kashou]: 「...Does it?」
[Kashou]: 「Where I studied abroad is close to here, so it's got a lot of nostalgia for me. Kind of like I'm back for the first time in a while.」
[Shigure]: 「Ah, your old school is nearby, Nii-sama?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, a few minutes down this street, in fact.」
[Shigure]: 「In that case, are a lot of the customers here at the original La Soleil students?」
[Kashou]: 「Hmm... They have their fair share of students, but...」
[Kashou]: 「I'd say housewives are the biggest group of customers. A lot of mothers come with their kids, too.」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "I've heard from Master a few times... but I finally got to visit."
Shigure: "For me, it's a holy site. Truly, the spirit of圣地巡礼 is here."
Kashou: "…Is that so?"
Kashou: "Because my study abroad place is nearby, I feel nostalgic. Like I've come back home."
Shigure: "So Master's study abroad place is near here, huh?"
Kashou: "Yeah, a few minutes down this street."
Shigure: "Then the main La Soleil probably has many students as guests?"
Kashou: "Hmm… there are some student guests too..."
Kashou: "But still, housewives make up the most. Mothers with children come often."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「フランスでは、食事のときにケーキを食べるのは、ごく普通のことだ」
[嘉祥]: 「一般家庭でも、夕飯は――サラダ、スープ、パン、魚料理、肉料理、チーズ、デザート……みたいに出すからな」
どのくらい皿数を出すかは、各家庭によるが。
[時雨]: 「毎日がフランス料理ですね」
[嘉祥]: 「だから、ほとんど毎日のようにケーキを食べる人も、そう珍しくないんだよ」
[時雨]: 「ふむふむ……なるほど……」
[時雨]: 「なんだか、不思議な感じがします。ご家庭でコース料理だなんて」
[嘉祥]: 「いやいや……日本の一般的な家庭料理だって、別の国の人からしたら、まるで懐石料理だよ」
[嘉祥]: 「お茶、お米、味噌汁、惣菜、肉魚……使っている皿の数には、大差ないだろ？」
[時雨]: 「言われてみれば……！」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「But here in France, it's extremely common to eat cake at dinner time.」
[Kashou]: 「Even when it comes to normal families, dinner usually goes: Salad, soup, bread, seafood, meat, cheese, desert.」
How many dishes they produce depends on the family, though.
[Shigure]: 「Every day is French cuisine, then.」
[Kashou]: 「So, yeah, it's not that rare to see most people eating a cake almost every day.」
[Shigure]: 「Mm-hmm, mm-hmm... I see.」
[Shigure]: 「I still find it rather curious that households partake in full course meals.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I mean... even for general home cooking in Japan, from other countries' perspective, it looks like a Japanese version of a full course meal.」
[Kashou]: 「Tea, white rice, miso soup, entrees, meat, and fish... There's not much difference between the amount of dishes they use.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, when you put it that way...!」
ModelAnswer:
SPEAKER_NAME: "In France, it's quite ordinary to eat cake during meals."
SPEAKER_NAME: "Even in general households, dinner is usually served with salad, soup, bread, fish dishes, meat dishes, cheese, and dessert... something like that."
The number of plates varies by household.
SPEAKERS_NAME: "Every day is French cuisine, isn't it?"
SPEAKER_NAME: "So, people who eat cake almost every day aren't really that uncommon."
SPEAKERS_NAME: "Hmm... I see..."
SPEAKERS_NAME: "It feels a bit strange. Having a multi-course meal in one's own home."
SPEAKER_NAME: "No no... what we consider ordinary household dishes in Japan would be considered kaiseki to people from other countries."
SPEAKER_NAME: "Tea, rice, miso soup, side dishes, meat and fish... the number of plates used isn't that different, right?"
SPEAKERS_NAME: "You're right about that!"

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「あっ、私、水無月時雨と申します」
[時雨]: 「や、約束もないのに、ついてきてしまって……もちろん、ご迷惑はおかけしませんので！」
[ベニエ]: 「時雨……？　じゃあ、嘉祥の妹の……？」
[時雨]: 「は、はい」
[嘉祥]: 「申し訳ありません、師匠……勝手についてきてしまって」
[ベニエ]: 「よく来たわね、時雨……！　ずっと会いたいと思っていたわ」
[時雨]: 「あ……私もです、ベニエさん。兄様ったら、帰国したあと師匠様の話ばかりするものだから」
[ベニエ]: 「あら、そうなの？　嘉祥は、フランスでは妹の話ばかりしていたわ」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ、そ、そんなことはないでしょう……？」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Oh, I am Shigure Minaduki.」
[Shigure]: 「I-I'm here unannounced since I tagged along... but, of course, I will make sure that I am of no inconvenience!」
[Beignet]: 「Shigure...? Then, you're Kashou's little sister...?」
[Shigure]: 「Y-Yes, ma'am.」
[Kashou]: 「My apologies, Mentor... She followed me of her own accord.」
[Beignet]: 「I'm so glad you've come, Shigure...! I've always wanted to meet you!」
[Shigure]: 「Oh... As have I, Beignet-san. Nii-sama couldn't stop talking about his prized mentor after coming back from overseas, after all.」
[Beignet]: 「Oh my, is that so? Kashou couldn't stop talking about his lovely little sister while in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Th-That isn't true, though...?」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Shigure: "Ah, I'm Minaduki Shigure."
Minaduki Shigure: "Y-You... came following me without any appointment... Of course, it's no trouble at all!"
Beignet: "Shigure...? So, Master Kashou's sister...?"
Minaduki Shigure: "H-Hai"
Minaduki Kashou: "I'm sorry, Mentor... for擅自插入的内容已被移除，因为它不符合指导方针。继续翻译吧。
Minaduki Shigure: "Ah... I feel the same way, Mr. Beignet. Brother always talks about you whenever he returns from abroad."
Beignet: "Oh? Really? Kashou was always talking about his sister in France."
Minaduki Kashou: "E-Excuse me, such things shouldn't be said..."

Question:
[フレーズ]: 「わかりました……それじゃあ、看板を出すのを手伝ってください。そのあと、窓ガラスを拭きます」
[時雨]: 「はい！」
[ベニエ]: 「私も、準備をしないと」
[嘉祥]: 「俺も手伝います！」
[ベニエ]: 「おやおや、何を言っているのかしら？」
[嘉祥]: 「え？」
[ベニエ]: 「嘉祥の場合は手伝いじゃなく、貴方の役目よ？　２日間だけでも、滞在するからには働いてもらうわ。前と同じように」
[嘉祥]: 「あ……もちろんです！！」
何年も働いていた店だ。物の位置も、段取りも、ほとんど変わっていない。全て覚えている。
俺は戸惑うことなく、開店準備に取りかかった。
ショーケースの中を拭き、ケーキを並べる。
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「Very well... In that case, I would appreciate it if you helped me bring out the sandwich sign. Afterward, we'll clean the windows.」
[Shigure]: 「Right!」
[Beignet]: 「I should get things ready myself.」
[Kashou]: 「I'll help you with that!」
[Beignet]: 「Oh my, what are you talking about?」
[Kashou]: 「Huh?」
[Beignet]: 「This isn't going to be 'helping out', this is going to be your 'role'. You're only here for two days, but I'm going to have you work since you're here. Just like before.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh... Of course!」
I worked in this shop for years. The location of items, the preparations—almost nothing has changed. I remember everything.
I get started on preparing for opening without any indecision.
I wipe off the glass showcase and line up the cakes.
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "I understand... Then, please help me put up the signboard. After that, I'll clean the window glass."
Shigure: "Yes!"
Beignet: "I should also prepare myself."
Kashou: "I'll help too!"
Beignet: "Oh oh, what are you saying?"
Kashou: "Huh?"
Beignet: "In Kashou's case, it's not about helping but your duty? Since you're staying for two days, I expect you to work like before."
Kashou: "Ah... Of course!!"
It's a store where I've worked for many years. The placement of items and the setup are almost unchanged. I remember everything.
Without hesitation, I started with the opening preparations.
I wiped inside the showcase and arranged the cakes.

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「変わり映えがないでしょう」
[嘉祥]: 「とんでもない。俺にとっては、今もこのケーキが完璧で究極の目標です」
[嘉祥]: 「……俺……父親にケーキを食べてもらおうと思ったんです」
[ベニエ]: 「そう……どうだったかしら？」
[嘉祥]: 「でも、父親は食べるまでもないって」
[ベニエ]: 「…………そう」
[嘉祥]: 「そして、俺の料理には芯がないそうです。軸とか核とか主って意味だと思うんですけど」
自分でも理解していない概念をフランス語で説明するのは難しかった。
[嘉祥]: 「師匠……もう一度、俺に修行させてもらえませんか？」
[ベニエ]: 「私にも、嘉祥のお父さんの言う芯の意味はわかりません」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「Well, nothing much has changed.」
[Kashou]: 「Don't sell yourself short. These cakes are perfect, and they're the ultimate goal for me.」
[Kashou]: 「...I... tried to get dad to eat my cake.」
[Beignet]: 「I see... And how did that go?」
[Kashou]: 「Dad said 'he didn't need to eat it'.」
[Beignet]: 「...I see.」
[Kashou]: 「He also said that my cooking lacks a 'core'. I think he means a 'main part', like an 'axis' or a 'nucleus' in other things.」
It's hard trying to explain a concept I don't comprehend myself into French.
[Kashou]: 「Mentor... Will you allow me to train under you once again?」
[Beignet]: 「I'm not sure what this 'core' your father speaks of is, either.」
ModelAnswer:
Beignet: "It doesn't look much different, does it?"
Minaduki Kashou: "Not at all. To me, this cake is still perfect and the ultimate goal."
Minaduki Kashou: "...I... wanted to let my father try this cake."
Beignet: "So... how was it?"
Minaduki Kashou: "But he said there's no need for him to even eat it."
Beignet: "......That's true."
Minaduki Kashou: "And they say my cooking lacks a core. I think they mean the axis or center or main ingredient."
Explaining a concept I don't fully understand in French was difficult.
Minaduki Kashou: "Mentor... Can you let me train with you again, please?"
Beignet: "Even I don't understand what your father means by 'core'."

metadata:
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「そう思います。父親は頑固で口下手だけど……認めたくないからって嘘を言うような人じゃない」
[ベニエ]: 「説明しなかったことに、意味がある。それは理解できているのね？」
[嘉祥]: 「ええ、たぶん」
[ベニエ]: 「なら、私には教えることができない。それも理解できる？」
[嘉祥]: 「はい……」
おそらく、俺には足りないものがある。
そして、父親と師匠は理解している。
しかし、言葉で説明できるようなものではない。
[嘉祥]: 「ううぅ……」
悩んでしまい、また思考がぐるぐると頭の中を回った。
[ベニエ]: 「私は役に立たないと言ったでしょう？　今のうちに国へ帰る？」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、いや！　何かを見つけなければ、帰れません」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「That's what I think, too. Dad is hardheaded and terrible with words, but... he's not the kind of person to lie just because he doesn't approve of something.」
[Beignet]: 「There is some meaning behind him not explaining himself. You realize that, at least?」
[Kashou]: 「Yes, somewhat.」
[Beignet]: 「Then, I can't teach you anything. You realize that as well?」
[Kashou]: 「Yes...」
I'm guess there's something I'm missing.
Something dad and Mentor both understand.
However, it's not something that can be explained in words.
[Kashou]: 「Unghh...」
I find myself lost with my thoughts running around in circles in my head.
[Beignet]: 「I told you that I wouldn't do you any good, didn't I? Why not get back to Japan while you still can?」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, no! I cannot go back until I find something—anything.」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "I think so. Father might be stubborn and not good with words... but he's not the kind of person who would lie just to avoid admitting something."
Beignet: "There's a reason for not explaining it. You understand that, right?"
Minaduki Kashou: "Yes, probably."
Beignet: "Then I can't teach you what you need to know. You understand that too, right?"
Minaduki Kashou: "Yes..."
Probably, there's something I'm missing.
And both father and mentor understand.
But it's not something that can be explained with words.
Minaduki Kashou: "Uuuh..."
I was troubled and my thoughts kept swirling in my head again.
Beignet: "Didn't I say I couldn't help? Should we go back to the country now?"
Minaduki Kashou: "No! I can't return until I find something."

Kashou: "Yeah, true. With such a big bed, it should be fine."
Shigure: "…………What!?"
Kashou: "If you don't like it, that's another matter."
Shigure: "H-Ha... Ha ha... Brother-sama and... !?"
Shigure: "Ugh... I'm so happy... I might faint."
Beignet: "Really? Are you sure, Kashou?"
Kashou: "Shigure gets like this sometimes, but she's always fine. Believe in me, Master."
Beignet: "Huhu... Then, you're safe now."
Beignet: "That's true... Shigure is a girl like this. It's nice to meet you."

Question:
[時雨]: 「きっと頻繁に手を入れているのでしょうね。部屋は使わなければ、悪くなるものですから」
[嘉祥]: 「言われてみれば……」
[時雨]: 「毎日のように窓を開けたり、埃を払わないと、すぐカビ臭くなります」
[嘉祥]: 「そういうものか？」
[時雨]: 「実家にある兄様の部屋は、私が毎日のように手入れしていますから万全です」
[時雨]: 「窓を開けて、空気を入れ換えて、机を乾拭きし、ベッドの寝心地を確かめています」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、そうか」
ベッドの寝心地は、毎日チェックする必要が……？
[時雨]: 「たぶんベニエさんは、また兄様が来るのをずっと待っていたのだと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「そうか……」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am to assume that she frequently tidies it up. Rooms are meant to be used, after all.」
[Kashou]: 「Now that you mention it...」
[Shigure]: 「Unless you open the windows and dust almost daily, the smell of mildew will instantly grow.」
[Kashou]: 「Is that how it works?」
[Shigure]: 「I tidy up your room back at home almost every day, so it is spotless.」
[Shigure]: 「I open the windows, air out the inside, wipe down your desk, and check the comfort levels of your bed.」
[Kashou]: 「O-Oh, I see.」
Is there a need for a daily check of my bed's comfort levels...?
[Shigure]: 「It might be that Beignet-san had been waiting for your return this entire time, Nii-sama.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh. Maybe...」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "It's probably because you're constantly messing with it, ne. If you don't use the room, it'll get worse."
Kashou: "You're right..."
Shigure: "Every day, you open the windows and dust if you don't, it gets moldy quickly."
Kashou: "That sort of thing?"
Shigure: "The room my brother -sama has at home is in perfect condition because I take care of it every day."
Shigure: "I open the windows to change the air, dry wipe the desk, and check the comfort of the bed."
Kashou: "S-so..."
Checking the bed's comfort every day...?
Shigure: "Probably, I think Beignet -san has been waiting for your brother -sama to come back forever."

Question:

[時雨]: 「はーい」
[時雨]: 「にゃ～お♪　にゃお？　にゃおぅん」

[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、今日は、お疲れさまだったな」

[嘉祥]: 「いいさ……俺だって勝手に来たんだ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Tomorrow's another early day. Let's shower up and get to bed.」
[Shigure]: 「Huh? We're showering together?! W-Well... m-my body and mind... are ready.」
[Kashou]: 「Of course not together. Hurry and take yours first.」
[Shigure]: 「Right away!」
[Shigure]: 「Nya~oh♪ Nyaoh? Nya-ohm.」
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, you're sick. You need a hospital ASAP.」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies. I am just so thrilled that I forgot human speech for a second.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, you did work hard today.」
[Shigure]: 「You are too kind. Especially considering I tagged along of my own accord.」
[Kashou]: 「Don't sweat it. I came here of my own accord too, so we're in the same boat.」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Tomorrow's early. Take a shower and go to sleep."
Minaduki Shigure: "Eh, together for the shower!? T-That... I... need to finish... my mental preparation..."
Minaduki Kashou: "There's no way that's necessary. Hurry up and take a shower."
Minaduki Shigure: "Hai"
Minaduki Shigure: "Nyaa~o♪ Nyao? Nyauun"
Minaduki Kashou: "Shigure is sick, we need to go to the hospital soon"
Minaduki Shigure: "I'm sorry. I got too happy and forgot to speak in cat language"
Minaduki Kashou: "Well, today you did a good job"
Minaduki Shigure: "Those are kind words. After all, I followed you without permission"
Minaduki Kashou: "It's okay... I came on my own too"

Question:

[Shigure]: 「Hah... Hah.. Nii-sama, are you already asleep?」
[Kashou]: 「...Uh, no, not yet.」

[Shigure]: 「You have me. You also have Beignet-san, Fraise, and the other catgirls as well.」
[Kashou]: 「...Speaking of which, I wonder how they're all doing.」
[Shigure]: 「Perhaps I should have employed a pet-sitter after all.」

Shigure: "Haa... haa... Master, are you already asleep?"
Kashou: "…No, but I still am."
Shigure: "…I heard from Maple that lately you're having trouble falling asleep."
Kashou: "That's true. When alone, I end up thinking about various things."
Shigure: "But now, you're not alone, right?"
Kashou: "Ah... I know."

Kashou: "…Speaking of which, are the cats doing well?"
Shigure: "Perhaps it was better to have a pet sitter come over."

[Shigure]: 「...Well, I wish I was a catgirl.」

[Shigure]: 「True. If I were a catgirl, then I wouldn't be your sibling...」
[Shigure]: 「Gasp! Maybe you should be the catBOY instead!」

Kashou: "If you were a cat, things would have been difficult"
Shigure: "...If only I was a cat too"
Kashou: "You're Shigure after all, and my dear sister"
Shigure: "Indeed, if I were a cat, then you wouldn't be my brother anymore..."

時雨は起き上がり、乱れた寝間着を直すと、よろよろとシャワー室へ歩いていった。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Hah, hah... Oh, Nii-sama...」
[Kashou]: 「What happened, Shigure?! Did you catch a cold?!」
[Shigure]: 「I-I'll be fine... You were just... too much to handle, Nii-sama...」

[Shigure]: 「...No. I did not do a thing... I did not lay a single finger upon you.」
[Kashou]: 「In any case, why don't you hop in the shower? You're dripping with sweat, and the sheets are soaking wet.」
[Shigure]: 「I am glad it was only sweating I did... I nearly turned someone else's bed into the scene from a splatter film.」
[Kashou]: 「Your nose is bleeding...?」
Shigure rises up, fixes her disheveled pajamas, and staggers her way to the shower room.
ModelAnswer:

Kashou: "What happened, Sugure!? Did you catch a cold!?"
Sugure: "N-no, I'm fine... I... it's just that... Brother-sama was... too intense..."
Kashou: "I don't think I did anything... You didn't do anything either, right?"

Kashou: "Maybe take a shower first? You're drenched in sweat. The sheets are soaked."

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「I've been in this line of work for much longer, but you're way more diligent than I'll ever be.」
[Fraise]: 「You put painstaking detail into your work. I'd like to learn by your example.」
[Kashou]: 「Really?」
[Fraise]: 「Granted, I oftentimes see you space out...」
[Kashou]: 「Urk...」
[Fraise]: 「You have a lot of things on your mind that you need to sort out at the moment, right, Kashou-san?」
[Fraise]: 「Pâtissière told me some of the details.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, but that's still no reason to space out in the middle of work.」
[Fraise]: 「I will work to pick up the slack.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm not sure what I should say...」
I feel somewhere between apologetic and pathetic. Of course, I'm more grateful than anything, but that goes without saying.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "I've been working longer, but she's more efficient in her work, somehow."
Fraise: "Kashou-sensei is meticulous about the details. I want to learn from you."
Minaduki Kashou: "Is that so?"
Fraise: "Sometimes, you seem a bit spacey..."
Minaduki Kashou: "Ugh..."
Fraise: "You must be troubled by a lot of things to need to think right now, probably..."
Fraise: "I heard a little about your situation from the pastry chef."
Minaduki Kashou: "It's not a good reason to daydream during work hours."
Fraise: "Then I'll make up for it with my work."

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、ケーキの作り方を教えてもらってる」
[嘉祥]: 「まだ、自慢するほど美味しくは作れないけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「よかったら、どうぞ。君のためにフレーズのマカロンを作ってみたんだ」
[？？？]: 「ふれーずの……？」
[嘉祥]: 「そうだよ」
フレーズはフランス語で、苺の意味だ。
[？？？]: 「はむ……」
[？？？]: 「ふわぁぁ……！　おいしい！」
[嘉祥]: 「本当に！？」
[？？？]: 「うん、おいしー。ありがとう、おにーさん！」
[嘉祥]: 「君はいつまでここに居るかは知らないが、よかったら、お店の手伝いをしてあげてくれ」
[嘉祥]: 「そうすれば、みんなにこの美味しさを届けることが出来るんだ」
[？？？]: 「するー！！」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I'm having her teach me how to make cakes.」
[Kashou]: 「Though, I'm still not good enough to make anything to brag about...」
[Kashou]: 「Have some, if you'd like. I tried to make some macaron à la fraise for you.」
[???]: 「Fraise...?」
[Kashou]: 「That's right.」
Fraise is French for strawberry.
[???]: 「Nom...」
[???]: 「Fwaah...! So yummy!」
[Kashou]: 「Really?!」
[???]: 「Yeah, it's so yummy. Thank you, Onii-san!」
[Kashou]: 「I don't know how long you're gonna be here for, but if it's okay with you, why don't you try helping around the shop.」
[Kashou]: 「If you do, you'll be able to deliver the tastiness to everyone else.」
[???]: 「I will!」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Ah, I'm learning how to make cakes."
Minaduki Kashou: "I still can't make them as delicious as to brag about... but..."
Minaduki Kashou: "If you'd like, feel free. I made macarons for you, Fraise."
????: "Fraise's...?"
Minaduki Kashou: "That's right."
Fraise means strawberry in French.
????: "Hmu..."
????: "Fwaahh...! Yummy!"
Minaduki Kashou: "Really!?"
????: "Yeah, it's yummy. Thanks, big brother!"
Minaduki Kashou: "I don't know how long you'll be staying here, but if you'd like, I can have you help out in the shop."
Minaduki Kashou: "That way, you can share this deliciousness with everyone."
????: "Sure!!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「……どうしましたか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いや……ちょっと昔のことを思い出して」
[嘉祥]: 「実は、少しの間だけ、フレーズとは一緒に暮らしてたんだよ」
[嘉祥]: 「フレーズはすごく小さい仔ネコだったし、ほんの短い間だったから、覚えてないと思うけど」
[嘉祥]: 「君は、幼い頃から賢い子だったよ」
[フレーズ]: 「あ、あの……」
[嘉祥]: 「ん？」
[フレーズ]: 「実は……覚えています……嘉祥さんが、ここに住んでいたこと」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ、そうだったのかい！？」
[フレーズ]: 「すみません。会ったときに、気づいたんですけれど……」
[嘉祥]: 「言ってくれればよかったのに」
[フレーズ]: 「嘉祥さんには、何か大切な用事があるようですし……」
[フレーズ]: 「覚えてる、だけですから」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「...What is the matter?」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, no. Just a little trip down memory lane.」
[Kashou]: 「Actually, I lived together with you, Fraise, albeit for just a short while.」
[Kashou]: 「You were a super small kitten back then, and it was a really short time, so I don't think you remember.」
[Kashou]: 「You've been smart ever since you were a kid.」
[Fraise]: 「U-Um...」
[Kashou]: 「Hm?」
[Fraise]: 「Actually... I do remember... I remember that you used to live here.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Wait, you do?!」
[Fraise]: 「I'm sorry. I realized right when we met, but...」
[Kashou]: 「Dang, you should have told me.」
[Fraise]: 「Well, you seemed to have more pressing matters to attend to...」
[Fraise]: 「I just remember; that's all.」
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "……What's wrong?"
Minaduki Kashou: "No... I was just thinking about something from a while ago."
Minaduki Kashou: "Actually, for a short time, I lived with Fraise."
Minaduki Kashou: "She was such a tiny kitten back then, and it was only for a brief period, so you probably don't remember."
Minaduki Kashou: "You were smart even when you were young."
Fraise: "Ah, that..."
Minaduki Kashou: "Hm?"
Fraise: "Actually... I do remember... that you used to live here."
Minaduki Kashou: "Really! ?"
Fraise: "I'm sorry. I noticed it when we met..."
Minaduki Kashou: "You should have told me."
Fraise: "It seems like there's something important for you, Master..."
Fraise: "I only remember."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
箸の持ち方は完璧だし、椀の扱い方まで知っていた。
[嘉祥]: 「こちらは、デザートです。和食を希望されたので、合うようにアレンジしていますが」
[ベニエ]: 「おやおや……抹茶のモンブランね？　どんな味か興味があったのよ」
[時雨]: 「素敵です、兄様」
[フレーズ]: 「緑色のモンブラン……」
[嘉祥]: 「見た目は違和感があるかな？　こっちも、よかったら」
[フレーズ]: 「あ……」
[ベニエ]: 「あら、フレーズのマカロンかしら？」
[嘉祥]: 「はい。さっき昔のことを思い出しまして。また作ってみようかと」
[時雨]: 「わぁ、可愛らしいです、兄様。いただきます」
[フレーズ]: 「…………はむ」
[フレーズ]: 「…………ッ！！」
reference_answer:
She held the chopsticks perfectly and even knew how to hold her soup bowl.
[Kashou]: 「Here's dessert. Since you all wanted Japanese food, I made this one fit the theme.」
[Beignet]: 「My, oh my... The green tea Mont Blanc, is it? I was curious how it would taste.」
[Shigure]: 「This is wonderful, Nii-sama.」
[Fraise]: 「A green Mont Blanc...」
[Kashou]: 「Does it strike you as odd? I also made these, if you'd like.」
[Fraise]: 「Oh...」
[Beignet]: 「Oh, macaron à la fraise?」
[Kashou]: 「Yes, I had a little trip down memory lane, so I figured I would try making them again.」
[Shigure]: 「Wow, they're so adorable, Nii-sama. Thank you so much.」
[Fraise]: 「...Om.」
[Fraise]: 「...!!」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "The way you hold the chopsticks is perfect, and you even knew how to handle the bowl."
Beignet: "Oh oh… Green tea mont Blanc? I was curious about what it would taste like."
Minaduki Shigure: "It's beautiful, Master."
Fraise: "Green-colored Mont Blanc…"
Minaduki Kashou: "There might be a sense of incongruity in the appearance? Here, try this one too if you'd like."
Fraise: "A…"
Beignet: "Oh, Fraise's macarons?"
Minaduki Kashou: "Yes. I recalled something from the past just now. Maybe I'll make them again."
Minaduki Shigure: "Wow, it's cute, Master. I'll have this."
Fraise: "………… Bite…"
Fraise: "…………!!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「わたし、お兄さんに憧れて……お店を手伝っていました」
[ベニエ]: 「それでここの飼いネコになってずっと手伝いたいって言いだして、名前もフレーズにしたのね」
[嘉祥]: 「確かネコは３か月の頃に名前を決めるが、そこから来たのか……」
[フレーズ]: 「今、お兄さんは大変なときだから……わたしのことなんて、言わないようにって思っていたのに」
[フレーズ]: 「ずっと、夢見ていたマカロンを食べたら……我慢できなくなってしまって……」
[時雨]: 「いいんですよ、フレーズ。そんなに我慢しなくても、兄様はわかってくれます」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、もちろんだよ。覚えててくれて、ありがとうな、フレーズ」
[嘉祥]: 「それと、師匠のことも。いっぱい手伝ってくれて、感謝してる」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「I've always looked up to you... and helped out in the shop because of that.」
[Beignet]: 「Then, once she became the catgirl here, she would always say she wanted to help out around shop and even made her name Fraise.」
[Kashou]: 「If memory serves, a catgirl picks their name when they're three months old, so that's when she came here, huh?」
[Fraise]: 「I know you're really busy right now, so... I decided that I wouldn't say anything about me.」
[Fraise]: 「But now that I've eaten the macaron I've dreamed about... I just couldn't control myself any longer...」
[Shigure]: 「It's fine, Fraise. You needn't contain yourself so badly. Nii-sama understands.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, of course. Thank you so much for remembering, Fraise.」
[Kashou]: 「Also, I appreciate you helping out Mentor in such big ways as well.」
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "I admired my brother... and used to help out at the shop"
Beignet: "And you ended up becoming a cat here and started wanting to keep helping, even changing your name to Fraise"
Kashou: "Indeed, cats are named around three months old... so that's where you came from..."
Fraise: "I thought he wouldn't want to talk about me because he's having such a tough time now..."
Fraise: "But when I finally got to eat the macaron I had always dreamed of... I couldn't hold back any longer..."
Shigure: "It's okay, Fraise. You don't have to restrain yourself so much, Brother-sama will understand"
Kashou: "Yeah, of course. Thank you for remembering, Fraise"
Kashou: "And for the mentor too. I'm grateful for all the help"

metadata:
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「泣いてたわたしに……マカロンを作ってくれた、お兄さん……っ」
[フレーズ]: 「嬉しかったです……っ……でも、それを言えないまま……お別れの意味も知らないうちに……」
[嘉祥]: 「すまない。君が来たときには、もう帰国は決まってたんだ」
[フレーズ]: 「お兄さん……こうして再会……できるなんて」
[嘉祥]: 「俺のほうこそ、驚いたよ。すっかり見違えるように大きくなってて」
[フレーズ]: 「わたし、お兄さんとの約束……守れましたか？」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、もちろんだよ。そうですよね、師匠？」
[ベニエ]: 「ええ、とっても。フレーズには、いっぱいお手伝いしてもらっているわ」
[フレーズ]: 「ううぅ……ありがとうございます……パティシエール」
[時雨]: 「フレーズ……よかったですね……ぐす」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「I'd never forget you for making me macarons when I was crying...」
[Fraise]: 「I was so happy... but... I couldn't say that... and by the time I knew what a 'farewell' was, you had...」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry. By the time you came, I was already scheduled to go back home.」
[Fraise]: 「I never thought the two of us would reunite...」
[Kashou]: 「I'm just as surprised. You got so big that I almost didn't recognize you.」
[Fraise]: 「Did I... keep my promise to you?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, you sure did. Isn't that right, Mentor?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes, incredibly well. Fraise has been an excellent help to me this whole time.」
[Fraise]: 「Unghhh... Thank you very much, Pâtissière.」
[Shigure]: 「Fraise... I'm so glad for you... Sniff.」
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "When I was crying... you made macarons for me, big brother..."
Fraise: "I was so happy... but I couldn't say it before we said goodbye... without knowing the meaning of farewell..."
Minaduki Kashou: "Sorry. By the time you came, my return had already been decided."
Fraise: "Big brother... to be able to meet again like this..."
Minaduki Kashou: "I was surprised too. You've grown so much I hardly recognize you."
Fraise: "Did I keep my promise with big brother?"
Minaduki Kashou: "Of course, that's right. Isn't that true, Master?"
Beignet: "Yes, very much so. Fraise has been helping me a lot."
Fraise: "Uuuu... thank you... pastry chef."
Minaduki Shigure: "Fraise... it's good... sniffling."

metadata:

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「あ、あの……お兄さん……」
[嘉祥]: 「なんだい？」
[フレーズ]: 「また、昔みたいに……お兄さんと呼んでも、いいですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「もちろん」
[時雨]: 「兄様を慕う者どうし、仲間ですね、フレーズ！」
[フレーズ]: 「は、はい……わたし、時雨さんほどじゃないと思いますけど……」
[時雨]: 「遠慮しなくていいのですよ。さあ、素直になって」
[フレーズ]: 「本当に、そういうのじゃないですから……！」
[時雨]: 「今なら、スペシャルサービスで兄様の寝顔ブロマイドがつきます」
[フレーズ]: 「えっ、なんですか？　寝顔って……？」
[嘉祥]: 「おい、時雨……？」
[ベニエ]: 「ふふ……」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「U-Um... Onii-san...」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah?」
[Fraise]: 「Would it be all right if I called you Onii-san again? Just like the old days?」
[Kashou]: 「Of course it would.」
[Shigure]: 「Anyone who appreciates Nii-sama is a friend of mine, Fraise!」
[Fraise]: 「R-Right... Although, I don't think I'm quite at the level you are, Shigure-san...」
[Shigure]: 「You needn't be so reserved. Come now, be honest with yourself.」
[Fraise]: 「No, really, I'm telling the truth...!」
[Shigure]: 「If you act now, then I will throw in a Sleeping Nii-sama bromide as a special gift.」
[Fraise]: 「Huh? What is a Sleeping...?」
[Kashou]: 「Hey, Shigure...?」
[Beignet]: 「Tee hee...」
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "Ah, a-a... big brother..."
Kashou: "What is it?"
Fraise: "Can I call you big brother again, just like in the old days?"
Kashou: "Of course"
Shigure: "As those who admire Master, we are comrades, Fraise!"
Fraise: "H-Hai... I don't think I'm as devoted as Shigure-san..."
Shigure: "There's no need to be reserved. Come now, be honest."
Fraise: "Really, it's not like that at all...!"
Shigure: "If you do this now, you'll get a special service with a photo of Master sleeping on the broom card."
Fraise: "Eh, what is that? Sleeping face...?"
Kashou: "Oi, Shigure...?"
Beignet: "Huhu..."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「大変です、お兄さん！　外に行列が……！」
[嘉祥]: 「おお……昨日に増して、すごいお客さんの数になってるな。まるで、クリスマスじゃないか」
[時雨]: 「元から知る人ぞ知る名店でしたが、ＳＮＳでさらに火が点いたのですね」
[嘉祥]: 「人事みたいに言うな」
[時雨]: 「すみません。まさか、ここまでの効果があるとは」
[フレーズ]: 「時雨さん……やりすぎだと思います」
[時雨]: 「なにを言っているんですか、フレーズ？　私だけが理由では、ありませんよ」
[時雨]: 「あなたのことも、とっても話題になっています。ほら！　ここにも、ほら！」
時雨が突き出したスマホには、フレーズを賞讃する言葉が並んでいた。
会いに行く、と宣言しているお客さんが何人もいる。おそらく、店の前にできた行列の中に……
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「Big trouble, Onii-san! There is a line outside...!」
[Kashou]: 「Ooh, we've got even more customers than we did yesterday. It's looking a lot like Christmas over here.」
[Shigure]: 「This shop has always been a popular spot among those in the know, but the social media presence seems to have sparked a bigger flame.」
[Kashou]: 「Don't talk like you didn't start it.」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies. I never thought that it would prove this effective.」
[Fraise]: 「Shigure-san... I think you may have overdid it.」
[Shigure]: 「What are you even saying, Fraise? I am not the only cause here.」
[Shigure]: 「You have become the hot topic yourself. Look! Right here, see?」
Shigure holds out her cellphone to reveal a line of comments praising Fraise.
There are even some customers stating they're explicitly coming to see her. Most likely standing in that line outside the shop...
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "It's bad, big brother! There's a line outside…!"
嘉祥: "Oh... The number of customers has grown even more than yesterday. It's like it's Christmas."
Shigure: "Originally known as a prestigious restaurant, it seems the fire was lit further by SNS."
嘉祥: "Don't say it like that."
Shigure: "I'm sorry. I never thought it would have such an effect."
Fraise: "Shigure-san... I think you've gone too far."
Shigure: "What are you talking about, Fraise? It's not just because of me."
Shigure: "Your place is also a topic of discussion. Look! Here and there!"
On Shigure's held-out smartphone, there were words praising Fraise.
Multiple customers had declared they would come to meet her. Probably among the line that formed in front of the store...

metadata:
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「む、無理！　無理です！　わたし、そういうのは……目立つのは苦手なんですぅ」
[時雨]: 「誰でも、最初はそうです。そのうち、気持ちよくなりますから」
[フレーズ]: 「時雨さんみたいになったら、困ります……」
[時雨]: 「フレーズ……？」
[嘉祥]: 「時雨、フレーズ、おしゃべりは後だ。お客さんを待たせないように、バリバリ働くぞ！」
[時雨]: 「は、はい！」
[フレーズ]: 「……わかりました、お兄さん。がんばります！」
[ベニエ]: 「申し訳ないわね、もう材料がないのよ」
[嘉祥]: 「もう今日は閉めるしかないな」
[時雨]: 「最後は撮影会みたいになっていましたね」
[フレーズ]: 「……カメラ、こわいです」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「N-No way! I can't! I don't like that... I don't like being the center of attention!」
[Shigure]: 「Everyone is like that at first. You will come to like it in time.」
[Fraise]: 「I don't think I'd like turning out like you, Shigure-san...」
[Shigure]: 「Fraise...?」
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, Fraise, save the chit-chat for later. Let's get working so we don't keep these customers waiting!」
[Shigure]: 「R-Right!」
[Fraise]: 「...Very well, Onii-san. I'll do my best!」
[Beignet]: 「Sorry. We're all out of ingredients.」
[Kashou]: 「Guess we'll have to close up shop for today, then.」
[Shigure]: 「It turned into more of a photo session toward the end.」
[Fraise]: 「...Cameras are scary.」
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "Mu, can't do it! Can't do it! I'm not good at things that draw attention..."
Shigure: "Everyone feels that way at first. You'll get used to it eventually."
Fraise: "If I end up like you, Shigure-san... "
Shigure: "Fraise...?"
Kashou: "Shigure, Fraise, let's talk later. We can't keep the customer waiting, so let's work hard!"
Shigure: "Hai!"
Fraise: "...I understand, big brother. I'll try my best!"
Beignet: "Sorry, we're out of ingredients now."
Kashou: "We might as well close for today."
Shigure: "It ended up like a photo session at the end."
Fraise: "...Camera scares me."

[時雨]: 「あ、私も」
[フレーズ]: 「後は任せてください、パティシエール」
[ベニエ]: 「ありがとう、みんな」
[嘉祥]: 「じゃあ、俺は厨房を片付ける。カウンターとか、店内は任せるよ」

掃除しながら、フレーズが時雨へと話しかける。
[フレーズ]: 「あの……」

[フレーズ]: 「お昼は……気持ちが盛り上がってしまって、あんなことを言ってしまったのですが……」

reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「I'm going to take it easy; I'm a tad tired.」
[Kashou]: 「Thank you for the fine service, Mentor. I will take care of cleaning up.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, so will I.」
[Fraise]: 「Please, leave cleanup to us, Pâtissière.」
[Beignet]: 「Thank all of you.」
[Kashou]: 「All right, I'll clean up the kitchen. I'll leave the counter and storefront to you guys.」
[Shigure&Fraise]: 「Understood.
As they clean, Fraise addresses Shigure.
[Fraise]: 「Um, excuse me...」
[Shigure]: 「Yes, what is it?」
[Fraise]: 「At lunch... I was so overcome with emotion that I blurted that out, but...」
[Shigure]: 「Blurted what out?」

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Oh, my apologies...」

[Kashou]: 「Eh. Well... I'm just still lost on what my father meant by a 'core'.」
[Kashou]: 「But after coming here and helping in the shop, I remembered something.」
[Kashou]: 「I really do want to make cakes that bring smiles to everyone's faces.」
[Kashou]: 「Mentor, your cakes are so good and have such a gentle flavor... that they bring smiles to people's faces.」

[Kashou]: 「I may have said that was my goal, but I was trapped by something else.」

Minaduki Kashou: "But coming here and helping out at the shop brought it back to me."
Minaduki Kashou: "I really want to make cakes that will make everyone smile."
Minaduki Kashou: "The cakes you make are truly delicious, with a gentle taste... they make everyone smile."

Question:
[ベニエ]: 「前にも言ったとおり、嘉祥のお父さんの真意はわからないけれど、私は貴方のことを応援しているわ」
[嘉祥]: 「ありがとうございます」
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、俺がケーキを作る理由は、何度も話しているけれど……師匠のことは聞いたことがないですよね」
[ベニエ]: 「……そうね」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、前に聞いたときは、ケーキを作る理由は、私がパティシエールだからって答えられたんですけど……」
[ベニエ]: 「ふふ……そうだったかしら？」
[嘉祥]: 「それなら、パティシエールになった理由は、どうなんでしょうか？」
[ベニエ]: 「……この店は……私の祖母の代からのもので、ずっとケーキを作ってきたの」
[ベニエ]: 「嘉祥の家ほどではないけれど、守るべき伝統があると思っているわ」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「Just as I've said before, I don't know what your father meant, but I support you, regardless.」
[Kashou]: 「Thank you very much.」
[Kashou]: 「Speaking of which, I've talked about my reasons for cake-making plenty of times, but... you've never talked about yours, have you, Mentor?」
[Beignet]: 「...That's right.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, when I asked you in the past, I remember you answered, 'I make cakes because I'm a pâtissière', but...」
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... Did I now?」
[Kashou]: 「In that case, what about your reasons for being a pâtissière in the first place?」
[Beignet]: 「...This pâtissièrie... has been making cakes since my grandmother's generation.」
[Beignet]: 「And while not to the extent of your family, I do think that it has a tradition that needs to be protected.」
ModelAnswer:
Beignet: "As I said before, I don't understand my father's true intentions regarding you, but I'm supporting you."  
Minaduki Kashou: "Thank you."  
Minaduki Kashou: "By the way, even though we've talked about why I make cakes many times... haven't you heard anything about my mentor?"  
Beignet: "…I suppose so."  
Minaduki Kashou: "No, when I asked before, I was told that the reason for making cakes is because I'm a pastry chef..."  
Beignet: "Hm… Is that so?"  
Minaduki Kashou: "Then, what about the reason for becoming a pastry chef?"  
Beignet: "…This shop… has been in my grandmother's generation and we've been making cakes all this time."  
Beignet: "I think there are traditions to uphold, even if not as much as your family's."

I became her apprentice to learn Western pastry making, so I avoided mentioning my parents owning a long-standing Japanese pastry shop to make things simpler...

I was avoiding mentioning that my family's confectionery shop is a long-standing one when I came to learn Western pastries as an apprentice...
BeNie: "That... "

Mashou: "What?"

Mashou: "No, that's fine. I wasn't hiding anything."
BeNie: "Y-Yes... Shigure told me the details."
Mashou: "I see. Sorry for going off on a tangent. The tradition of this La Soleil, right?"

Question:
[ベニエ]: 「私たちは結婚して、息子が生まれて……しばらくは３人で暮らしていたの」

[ベニエ]: 「息子がママはお日様みたいだねと言ってくれた」

ようやくラ・ソレイユの由来が聞けて、俺は嬉しかった。

[時雨]: 「……ご子息を……ご家族を愛していたのですね」

reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「We married, and I gave birth to a son... For a while, the three of us lived together.」
[Beignet]: 「When we did... my son told me that... my sweets put a smile on everyone's face.」
[Beignet]: 「He told me, 'Mama, you're just like the sun'.」
[Beignet]: 「The reason why I named this shop 'La Soleil' is because of my son's words.」
[Kashou]: 「I see. So that's why...」
It fills me with joy to finally find out the origin behind the name La Soleil.
However, this story doesn't seem to be leading toward a happy ever after.
[Shigure]: 「...You loved your son... You loved your family, yes?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes, that goes without saying.」
[Beignet]: 「However, I was forced to leave Japan.」
[Beignet]: 「My older brother, who was supposed to take over this pâtissièrie, died an early death...」
ModelAnswer:

Beignet: "Back then... my cookies made everyone smile, my son said."
Beignet: "My son said Mommy is like the sun."
Beignet: "I named this shop La Soleil because of those words."
Kashou: "So, that's the origin..."
Finally hearing the origin of La Soleil, I was happy.
But it didn't seem to be just a happy story.
Shigure: "...You loved your son... and your family."
Beignet: "Yes, I did."
Beignet: "But I had to leave Japan."
Beignet: "My brother, who was supposed to take over this shop, passed away too soon..."

Kashou: "I... still can't believe the mentor back then just failed."
Kashou: "Because if my mentor hadn't stayed in Japan and reopened a pastry shop in this town, I wouldn't have met such wonderful pastries."
Beignet: "Well, there's that perspective."
Fraise: "Me too! If not for the Pastry Chef, I might be... "
Beignet: "That's true. You might not have met me."

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「After all, that huge crowd of people had smiles on each of their faces, did they not?」
[Beignet]: 「...Yes, thankfully.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think  what you did in the past was a mistake, but I do think it's a fact that you couldn't take your son's feelings into consideration at the time.」
[Kashou]: 「Still, if your son is an adult now, I'm pretty sure that he's considering how you must've felt, too.」
[Beignet]: 「Isn't that just convenient wishful thinking?」
[Kashou]: 「Perhaps, but nothing is certain, which is why... I think you should give your son a visit.」
[Kashou]: 「I apologize for speaking outside my boundaries.」
[Fraise]: 「My opinion is the same as Onii-san's, Pâtissière.」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Shigure: "Because so many customers were smiling, weren't they?"
Beignet: "…It's a fortunate thing, I suppose."
Minaduki Kashou: "I can't believe my old mentor would fail. But it's also true that he couldn't consider his son's feelings."
Minaduki Kashou: "But if your son has grown up, maybe he'll be able to think about his mentor's feelings too."
Beignet: "That might be a convenient fantasy for me?"
Minaduki Kashou: "Maybe. But it's something I don't understand. So, I think... I should meet my son."
Minaduki Kashou: "I'm sorry for saying such an impulsive thing."
Fraise: "I also think the same as you do, chef."

Mentor regrets the fact that she was separated from her family.
I left my house voluntarily and became estranged from my parents.
Ever since that verbal spat I had on my mom's birthday, I haven't gotten in contact with them even once.
I'd say it definitely feels as though I'm on the wrong path, but...

The mentor regrets being separated from his family.
I left home of my own accord and have grown distant from my parents.
We had an argument on my mother's birthday and haven't spoken since, not even once.
It feels like I might already be off the right path...

[Kashou]: 「I don't think that I've ever been THAT heartless before. Actually, I just might dote a little too much...」

[Shigure]: 「But, in the past, I feel as though you wouldn't wait for me to say anything and you would just say, 'Hey, that looks heavy; I'll take that off your hands'.」

[Shigure]: 「However, you seem to let me make the decision for myself now.」

Shigure: "But now, Master has let me make my own judgment."

Question:
[時雨]: 「わぁ、クリスマスのプレゼントですか！？ありがとうございます、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「ちょっと早いかもしれないけれど、嘉祥ってば、また怒って帰っちゃうかもしれないでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、それは今日はないから！　信用してって」
[淡雪]: 「はい、嘉祥にも」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、うん……ありがとう」
[淡雪]: 「開けてみて？」
言われるがままに、包装紙を取って小箱を開けた。
[嘉祥]: 「……写真立て？」
写真は入っていないようだ。
[淡雪]: 「今年の想い出の１枚を部屋に飾ってみたら、楽しいと思うのよ？」
そういえば、母親が欲しがっていたとかで、誕生日に時雨がプレゼントしたのを思い出す。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Wow, a Christmas present?! Thank you so much, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「It might be a bit early, but Kashou just might get all huffy and go back home again.」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Kashou]: 「Th-That's not happening today! C'mon, believe me!」
[Awayuki]: 「And for you, too, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, yeah... Thanks.」
[Awayuki]: 「Open it.」
I remove the wrapping paper and open the small box as instructed.
[Kashou]: 「...A picture frame?」
It doesn't have a picture in it.
[Awayuki]: 「I think it'd be fun if you'd decorate your rooms with your best memory from this past year.」
That reminds me that my mother wanted a picture frame and Shigure got her one as a birthday present.
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "Wow, a Christmas present! Thank you so much, Mother!"  
Awayuki: "It might be a bit early, but Kashiou might get angry and come back anyway?"  
Shigure: "Ugh..."  
Kashiou: "That's why it's not today! Believe me."  
Awayuki: "Yes, for Kashiou too."  
Kashiou: "Ah, yeah... Thank you."  
Awayuki: "Open it?"  
Following her instructions, I removed the wrapping paper and opened the small box.  
Kashiou: "…A photo frame?"  
It doesn't seem to have a photo in it.  
Awayuki: "Why not try decorating your room with one of this year's memories? You might enjoy it."  
By the way, I remember Shigure giving her that as a birthday present because Mother wanted one.

[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまの！　あ、でも、どの写真が……うーん……」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、ソレイユ開店記念のときの写真にする。　ご主人さまとバニラと３人で撮ったやつ！」
[バニラ]: 「いいね。グッドチョイス。私も、そうする」
[メイプル]: 「あたしは、どうしようかしら？」
[シナモン]: 「アレがいいんじゃない～？　船で一緒に歌ったときの」
[シナモン]: 「動画だけじゃなく、写真も撮ってもらってたよね～？」
[メイプル]: 「あー。」
[メイプル]: 「……そうね。　ちょっと恥ずかしい気もするけれど」
[メイプル]: 「あれが、この１年で私にとって、一番大切な想い出だわ」
[シナモン]: 「メーちゃんの一番大切な思い出に……わたしも写って……はぁはぁ……うっ」
[メイプル]: 「え？　自分だけ写ってる写真なんだけど……？」
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「One of Master! Oh, but, which one? Hmm...」
[Chocola]: 「Oh, I'll put in the photo to commemorate the opening of La Soleil. The one with you, Master, and Chocola!」
[Vanilla]: 「Nice. Good choice. I'll do the same.」
[Maple]: 「What should I go with?」
[Cinnamon]: 「Why not that one~? You know, the one of us singing on the boat together.」
[Cinnamon]: 「They didn't just take videos; there's photos from then, too, right~?」
[Maple]: 「Aah, yeah.」
[Maple]: 「...Right. I feel like that'd be kind of embarrassing.」
[Maple]: 「But that is the most precious memory of the year to me.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I'm going to be in... May-chan's most precious memory... Hah, hah... Uhhh...」
[Maple]: 「Huh? I'm picking one with just me in it, though...」
ModelAnswer:
Chocola: "Master's! Uh, but which photo... hmm..."

Chocola: "Ah, let's use the one from when La Soleil opened. The one we three took with Master and Vanilla!"

Vanilla: "Sounds good. Great choice. I'll do that too."

Maple: "I wonder what to do..."

Cinnamon: "How about this? When we sang together on the boat!"

Cinnamon: "You got photos as well as a video, right~?"

Maple: "Ah."

Maple: "...Yeah. It does feel a bit embarrassing though."

Maple: "That's been my most precious memory of this past year."

Cinnamon: "If it's Maple-chan's most precious memory... I'll be in it too... huff huff... ah"

Maple: "What? There's only a photo of me..."
